definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: The next day, usman follow YiMing attended the wedding of SaDiKe.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，烏斯曼跟着伊明參加了薩迪克的婚禮。

sentences.english: Look, I don't think so, " added Sadek."
sentences.chinese: 看，我不這麼認爲，”薩迪克。
